description:
Description
For students living in the National Capital Region, Saint Paul University Residence is the place to be. No other accommodations in the area offer the opportunity to meet and interact with students from three different institutions of higher learning. Here you will find students from Saint Paul University, the University of Ottawa as well as Carleton University. Want to live close to downtown as well as your classes? Then, Saint Paul University Residence is the place for you.
Suite Features
title: University, College & Young Professional Accommodation In Ottawa

description:
Description
Hi my name is Emily I am 28 and am seeking a like minded, non-smoking, career oriented young female professional or student looking for shared accommodations to rent the second bedroom in my spacious two bedroom condo/apartment.
No allergies to cats is a must as I have one.
No additional pets are allowed (Condominium rules state 1 pet per unit).
The location is on the on the 16th floor of a quiet and secure high rise in the South Keys Area with great westerly views of Ottawa South.
Minutes walk to the Transit way, O-Train and Local Shopping at South Keys (Walmart, Loblaws etc.. ). Direct routes to downtown and both Carleton and Ottawa Universities.
Bedroom comes unfurnished, has a large window with blinds, hard wood floors and ample closet space.
Shared common spaces includes Main Bathroom, Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen, Balcony and In suite Washer/Dryer and storage.
In addition, access will be available to space in my designated storage unit in basement of building if needed, designated indoor Bike Racks, and Outdoor heated Pool and Sauna in summer months.
$800 monthly on a month to month agreement; all inclusive (Heat & Cooling/Hydro/Internet)
Secured (Fob access) parking spaces available for additional cost:
• Covered Parking Space: $75 a month
• Outdoor Parking Space: $50 a month
title: Roommate Wanted - All Inclusive $800/monthly

description:
Description
This is a beautiful 5 bedroom semi-detached raised ranch home in a quiet area, very clean and well-maintained. Parking for 3 cars. One large furnished bedrooms available May 1. Co-op Students welcome 4 or 12 month lease available. House is perfectly located on a bus route and within walking distance to Algonquin College or Carleton University – 15 min walk. Close to Grocery Stores, Banks, Tim Horton’s, Transportation, Parks, Mooney’s Bay Beach, Canal, Bike paths and other amenities. House features are: fully furnished home, hardwood floors throughout the house, kitchen, living room and dining rooms are on main level, air conditioning, 2 full bathrooms, 5 appliances, plus a large chest freezer in Laundry room, Hydro, water, gas, internet and Bell TV are included . There is also access to private backyard and BBQ. This is a great place to live – you will not be disappointed! Please contact Gordon Maclean at gordon.maclean1@sympatico.ca or on my cell at 905 407 0361 for further information

description:
Description
We would like to have a student or a coop student to become our roommate, to live with us in our beautiful 5 bedroom corner lot single house close to Algonquin College. It is a 10 min bus to Algonquin, and the bus stop is on our sidewalk. If you want to bike, it is a 20 min ride.
Come visit us, details below on the ad.
The house is very big, with over 2500 square feet of internal space, plus the basement, gym area, etc. There is a big garden in front and behind the house, so you can enjoy eating outside, gardening, or even playing ball. The house is very quiet. We are looking for somebody that can keep it this way. We all study and there is a lot of home work at times. We put our heads down, work hard and party during the weekend. Everybody cleans after themselves very well, so things are always organized and clean.
title: Searching for a Student roommate, house near Algonquin College

Walking distance to schools, parks and recreation complex, shopping & public transit. Includes stainless steel appliances and new front load washer / dryer.

description:
Description
At Accountapotamus Inc., we've successfully taught thousands of students all things Accounting, Bookkeeping and Quickbooks; teaching our programs in our hometown of Ottawa on a monthly basis, but also in cities and towns all across Ontario. According to Intuit, we are the largest Quickbooks Desktop trainer in the province.
We know how frustrating and time-consuming it can be trying to find a professional, clean and reliable space for meetings or courses that fits your budget and meets your needs. We get it. That’s why we built our own.
In our new Kanata office, we have a gorgeous meeting room full of natural light and a boardroom-style table that comfortably fits 10 people with additional seating available. There is a small break-out area with a large granite surface, perfect for lunch breaks, and we are more than happy to provide coffee, tea and water at no extra cost. We also include the use of our projector and whiteboards for your convenience.
title: KANATA AND OTTAWA BOARDROOM OR MEETING SPACE AVAILABLE FOR RENT

At the pet friendly 180 Beausoleil, not only can you bask in affordable style, but you are a step away from the most dynamic section of downtown Ottawa. title: Room for rent - Seeking female students or working professionals

description:
Description
Great opportunity to live in this fully renovated unit perfectly located just off the Transitway and steps away from Algonquin college. We are looking for 1 more female professional/student to occupy this gorgeous 4 bedroom, 2 bath apartment.
This unit features hardwood and ceramic flooring, LED lighting, a brand new huge kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, in unit laundry, central air conditioning, and loads of natural sunlight!
This unit boasts an incredible location right off the highway. Walk to the shops and restaurants at College Square, IKEA, and Algonquin College. Take a 10 minute walk to Iris station and hop on a quick bus to Carleton or Ottawa U via the Transitway.
Heat, internet, hydro, water, snow removal, and lawn care included. Room can be furnished if needed for additional fee. No smoking, no animals. Parking available at $50/ month. Students welcome with parental co sign. Book a viewing today!
